page.title: 10THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 9
page.content: enjoyable pastimes include Knitting , sewing , reading , cookery , dancing , do-it-yourself and being with friends. Many people enjoy walking and cycling. Others enjoy swimming and{94}people use the pools at Colchester and{32}at Witham. The Sports Centres at these places were well used. Many said they enjoy the Cinema at Colchester{(43.5%) and the Theatre at Colchester {(43%)} and London{(11.5%)}.There are various clubs and organizations in Marks Tey including the Stane Street Players (a drama group) , a cricket club , gardening club , Womens Institute , Church Fellowship and Senior Citizens club . They are attended by a quarter of those surveyed , so in our view those clubs are not well used. (E.Carder & C.Moss) PASTIMES-CHILDREN. Children of Marks Tey like to attend clubs in their
